title: Was it four days of "the worst days in American history" in December 2020?
subtitle: A widely shared concept has been developed of the deaths caused by the COPVID-19 Conference in a stark historical context.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: As a result of the COVID-19 epidemic, four out of eight "the deadliest days in American history" occurred in the first week of December 2020.
